name: Diagnostics
description:
Seleste is an android clinician, recently relocated to beautiful Althaea, planetary capital of Theobroma. Their new job has them assisting their fellow androids and augmented humans with a variety of issues along with repairing robots and even fixing electronics. But no matter who needs help, Seleste will try their best to solve the problem. And at the end of the day, they get to come home to their adoring spouse, Soldan, and as it just so happens, their half-year anniversary is around the corner…

Oh, and there is also an interplanetary summit happening. 

Featuring: 

A wholesome soft sci-fi setting where androids live happily and queer identities are celebrated, told over 17 chapters. An average read-through is around 90 minutes to 2 hours, but can be longer if you fully explore all the options.

An inclusive cast of colorful characters featuring androids, humans, AIs, and robots living in harmony. 

An emphasis on loving relationships - romantic, platonic, and familial all included. 

A chapter randomization mechanic that means everyone experiences the story in a unique way.

A simple bookmark system so you can save your place and come back to the story later.

Each chapter includes multiple interactive choices - some chapters even have multiple endings. 

You get to choose how the story ends!

First Draft Edition - Consider this the first pass at the game with a revised edition to come later. Twine's native undo/redo functionality is left turned on to encourage players to explore the story.

Plans for the Revised Edition - More editing passes, continuity and characterization tweaks, more interactive expanded endings.
